nathnam, ape rata ho aagama dushanaya kirimata ida nodi sadahatama owun wilanguwe lamayi.thawa da, ape anagatha tharuna parapurata dharmaya kiya diya haki buddhimath saha ugath bhikshunta dharmaye hasiriya haki parisarayak nirmanaya kirima da janadhipathiwarayage wagakimaki.esema, ‘anthar aagamika samadanaya saha iwasima wangimen sama pa්rajawakama aagamika nidahasa sahathika kerena athare buddhagama aaraksha kirimata saha poshanaya kirimata thaman bandi sitithi’ yi janadhipathiwaraya sabawinma wishwasa karanne nam, ‘thulanathmaka aagama’ namathi wishaya sama pasalakatama handunwadima gana salaka balimatath piliwana.
